definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: A thick yellow exudate coats the peritoneal surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 一层厚的黄色渗出物被覆在腹膜外。

sentences.english: An inflammatory exudate collects on the surface .
sentences.chinese: 炎性渗出物集合在表面。

sentences.english: Note that there is no alveolar exudate.
Commonly the muzzle is encrusted with mucus and exudate .
sentences.chinese: 鼻镜通常覆盖着粘液和渗出物。

sentences.english: The pleural surface at the lower left demonstrates areas of yellow-tan purulent exudate.
sentences.chinese: 左下胸膜表面可看见黄褐色脓性渗出物。

sentences.english: The yellow-tan exudate of acute bacterial meningitis seen here obscures the sulci.
sentences.chinese: 急性细菌性脑膜炎棕黄色渗出物使脑沟模糊不清。

sentences.english: Commonly the muzzle is encrusted with mucus and exudate.
sentences.chinese: 鼻镜通常覆盖着粘液和渗出物。

sentences.english: The yellow-tan clouding of the meninges seen here is due to an exudate from acute meningitis.
sentences.chinese: 这里所见棕黄色混浊物是急性脑膜炎的渗出物。

sentences.english: The cut surface at the right demonstrates yellowish-tan mucosal exudation with a hyperemic border.
sentences.chinese: 在右侧切面可见黄棕色黏膜渗出物，边缘有充血。

sentences.english: The epicardial surface of the heart shows a shaggy fibrinous exudate.
sentences.chinese: 心外膜表面可见粗糙的纤维蛋白渗出物。

sentences.english: The serosal surface at the left shows a tan-yellow exudate.
sentences.chinese: 左侧显示浆膜表面，有黄褐色渗出物。

definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
